HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Usluga dostave u stan iznosi 11,99 € za aparate do max težine 31,5 kg na području Grada Zagreba. Za ostale narudžbe, na zaprimljeni upit šaljemo ponudu koja uključuje uređaj i trošak dostave.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Dostava se vrši u periodu od 8h do 16h radnim danom. Dostavna služba će vam poslati SMS poruku na dan dostave.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostavlja na području Zagreba i okolice 50 km. Za udaljenije lokacije obračunava se dodatan putni trošak.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Na zaprimljeni upit šaljemo ponudu koja uključuje uređaj i trošak dostave i ugradnje.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Dostava se vrši u periodu od 8h do 16h radnim danom. Djelatnici će vas kontaktirati dan prije dostave kako biste dogovorili vrijeme.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostavlja na području Zagreba i okolice 50 km. Za udaljenije lokacije obračunava se dodatan putni trošak.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and in-store pickup are available. Home delivery is primarily for the Zagreb area and its surroundings (50 km), while in-store pickup is available at their Zagreb address.
PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by the company's own staff (Moje kuhinje d.o.o.) or an unspecified delivery service ('dostavna služba').
PRICING: Delivery to an apartment in Zagreb for items up to 31.5 kg costs €11.99. For all other deliveries, including those for bulky items or outside the main Zagreb area, a price quote is provided upon inquiry. In-store pickup is available, presumably for free.
RESTRICTIONS: Home delivery is only on weekdays (Monday-Friday, 8 am-4 pm). An additional travel cost is charged for locations further than 50 km from Zagreb, which would include islands.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The service includes carrying items into the customer's apartment. They also offer free removal and disposal of old appliances upon purchase of a new one. In-store pickup is available on Saturdays.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a single blog-style page, not a dedicated delivery section. While it provides basic information on available services and some pricing, it lacks a comprehensive price list and clear delivery timeframes (e.g., 2-5 business days). Customers must contact the company for a quote for most delivery scenarios, making the information incomplete for direct online purchases.
